TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AIAgentExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides extension methods for running AI agents in the agent server framework.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task RunAIAgentAsync (this Microsoft.Agents.AI.AIAgent agent, Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory? loggerFactory = default, string telemetrySourceName = "Agents");

static member RunAIAgentAsync : Microsoft.Agents.AI.AIAgent * Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory * string -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: Optional logger factory for creating loggers.
The name of the telemetry source. Defaults to "Agents".
Docs.summary: Runs an AI agent asynchronously with an optional logger factory.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

Docs.param: The service provider for dependency injection.
The name of the telemetry source. Defaults to "Agents".

Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task RunAIAgentAsync (this IServiceProvider sp, Microsoft.Agents.AI.AIAgent? agent = default, string telemetrySourceName = "Agents");

Docs.param: The service provider for dependency injection.
Optional AI agent to run. If null, retrieves from service provider.
The name of the telemetry source. Defaults to "Agents".
Docs.summary: Runs an AI agent asynchronously using the service provider's dependencies.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
